name: abracadabra-oliviad118
description: Welcome to your Abracadabra project! This project will teach you professional npm workflows and development automation by transforming a boring corporate website into something magical using cowsay and VS Code.

scripts.generate: cowsay 'Welcome to the most AWESOME website ever!' > generated/welcome.txt && cowsay -f dragon 'I am the guardian of this amazing site!' > generated/dragon.txt && cowsay -f tux 'Professional development tools make everything better!' > generated/tux.txt && node scripts/build-content.js
scripts.dev: npm run generate && npm run serve
